title: FS: T202 Lobert almost caught - SOLD
author: rainier2004

posts.post_title: FS: T202 Lobert almost caught - SOLD
posts.post_content:
For sale is a T202 with nice eye appeal.  Horizontal crease running length of card.  Back has an extremely light stamp that is to light to be legible and does not detract from eye appeal of card.  SOLD for a new home.

Shipping is on me, insurance is optional and on you.  References available upon request, pp gift preferred but will take almost any form of payment.  Thanks for looking.
